professional_summary: Database/Systems Administrator with 7 years of experience in military and aviation maintenance administration, possessing cross-platform expertise in system/database administration, troubleshooting, and security compliance.

work_experience.job_title: Maintenance Administration Work Center Supervisor - Database/Systems Administrator
key_responsibilities: Supervised 12 personnel in the administration and management of two Windows Servers and 100 workstations for 160 end users
ensuring 95% security compliance through software patching
Coordinated and performed the system integration of Naval Aviation Logistics Command Management Information System (NALCOMIS) within the ONE-NET network
ensuring 100% functionality for all end users.
resulting in the replacement and upgrade from Windows 2003 Application Server to Windows 2008 Application Server
while conducting regular software installs and patch updates for NALCOMIS OOMA (Optimized Organization Maintenance Activity) and McAfee endpoint protection software.
Provided technical leadership and oversight for the maintenance administration systems
ensuring operational readiness and compliance with military standards.
Resolved complex system issues related to network security
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement system upgrades and optimize operational efficiency.

technical_skills:
Cross-platform expertise in Windows Server, Linux, and macOS",
            "Database administration skills (SQL, NoSQL)",
            "Network security protocols and compliance standards",
            "System integration and optimization
tools_and_software:
Windows Server",
            "McAfee Endpoint Protection",
            "Retina scanning software",
